name: firefox-voice
title: Firefox Voice
description: Text straight from your browser with Google Voice
author: Jeff Principe

preferences.name: notificationEnabled
preferences.title: Enable Notifications
preferences.description: Whether or not you would like to receive HTML5 notifications for new unread text messages

preferences.name: updateFrequency
preferences.title: Update Frequency
preferences.description: The frequency, in seconds, with which you would like the add-on to check for new messages. Smaller values mean that messages come in faster, but may also cause Google Voice to blacklist your IP address.
